ISSUE.TITLE: Displaying third-party donors in bank entries
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request Would it be possible to display the Third Parties linked to a bank entry created by a donation in the Third Parties/Users column of the list of bank entries? ### Use case See: [https://www.dolibarr.fr/forum/t/liste-des-ecritures-bancaires-et-dons/35062](url) ### Suggested implementation _No response_ ### Suggested steps _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: different behavior on extrafield updates. (#30150)
